price: 18. Bakomisepelisa na oyo Nkolo wa bango akopesa bango, mpe Nkolo wa bango akobatela bango na etumbu ya lifelo.
arabic: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum wawaqāhum rabbuhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
